Text: Fwd NYNY Hi Folks Just passing this on If you know of anyone who fits this description please pass this on and to your lists if possible Thank you More to the point I need your help The Senators office wants a list of as many women we can find who were prosecuted for out of wedlock sexillegitimacy and lost their children PLEASE FORWARD A NOTICE TO ALL LISTS WHERE WE MIGHT FIND THESE WOMEN ESPECIALLY IF THE CASES TOOK PLACE IN NY Ask them to call the NY office give their names brief particulars address phone email This could include not only the adjudicated You were convicted of a crime said the assistant but anyone who was coerced or their children Senator Roy Goodman Albany office District office Janet Yahoo Groups Sponsor To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service Donna Go to your destiny
